trends: There have been no other sightings in New Denmark
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Highspeed white circle in the sky, about a mile or two away.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend and I were taking a late night walk on the back roads by her house- it was a cloudless night- and the sky was clear from light pollution. We began walking back to her house when I noticed a blip in the sky to my left- I stopped because it startled me. I asked my friend to stop and look for it- after about 3 seconds the blip in the sky reappeared- it could be covered by a nickel- and was around a mile or two away from us- this time directly in front of our vision- the blip lasted about 1 second or more- then disappeared. At first- we thought it was a plane... but it soon became clear that it was not. When the blip disappeared- we were both startled and searched the horizon ahead of us for it- about 3 seconds later- it appeared to our right- this time it was a bit smaller- presumably because it was a bit farther off- again this blip lasted only a second or so and disappread. We looked to our right for it to appear again- and sure enough it appeared twice more before moving too far away for us to see- each time getting smaller- but remaining to the right of our original position. The object moved faster than anything I have ever seen- spanning the entire horizon in a matter of 15-30 seconds. It was one of the most frightening and delightful experiences Ive had to date- I have never seen a UFO before or after this event- But I am convinced that nothing out or rural New Brunswick could move that fast.
